Game: Pitfall II- Lost Caverns 1994 Pitfall Harry has unlimited time and lives, making it impossible to "lose" the game; when Harry touches a dangerous creature, he simply loses points as he floats back to the last continue point (marked with a red cross) he touched. 1 http://images.launchbox-app.com/91a86dd2-9675-43d1-9d3c-6199105fe387.jpg <3dbox1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/8fc9d035-903f-4fc9-80d5-be9cbeb25325.png</3dbox1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/bc06f4f5-252f-408f-adfd-05506d8cc8f2.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/bb9b7792-26f5-4e84-a7fc-27415439b0d9.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/5651eca8-34a4-4f43-a694-d2394f8d2aaf.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/c21a31b5-d1f4-4641-916f-1742f600bb59.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/6155dc1f-c813-4698-8553-91e2021e40fc.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/0c634911-0164-442f-b344-fc5c10c95691.png 4 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pitfall_II:_Lost_Caverns Not Rated Platform David Crane Activision
